name: The Seven Seas
description:
(NOTICE: THE SEVEN SEAS IS CURRENTLY IN BETA WITH NO PLANS TO BE COMPLETED)

Sail the Seven Seas in a challenging naval action game in which timing and reflexes are the only thing standing between you and Davy Jones' locker. If you enjoy challenging games that make you think as quickly as you can click, The Seven Seas is the right game for you.

GAMEPLAY

The game includes 49 levels across 7 worlds (or "Seas"). Each level is a new challenge, and the gameplay difficulty consistently escalates as the game progresses.

The Seven Seas is played from three camera angles; the follow camera, the left camera, and the right camera. Use the follow camera to steer and move your ship, and use the directional cameras to aim and fire your cannons and defeat your enemies.

ENEMIES

You will encounter and battle 7 unique enemies with 20 variations. Some enemies are stationary, some with follow a designated path, and some with follow you and attack you. It is your goal to realize what the enemy is doing as quickly as possible in order to defeat them.
